text:
Ro: Hello, welcome to another Nerdy Nummies,
today I have a special guest Dodger

Ro: she’s my first repeating guest. Dodger:
Eeee, and apparently I’ve grown an

Dodger: inch since the last time we did one
of these. Ro: Dang it!
Dodger: It’s unfortunate. Ro: Ah-huh-huh-huh-huh-huh!
Dodger: Ah-huh-huh-huh-huh-huh!

Ro: We are making Binding of Isaac cupcakes
today, which is a cute and bloody

Ro: indie game. Dodger: It’s a fun game!
Ro: Dodge was playing it this morning.

Dodger: Yeah. Ro: It’s really cute, OK,
so to get started, we already pre-made

Ro: cupcakes. Dodger: Look at these, they’re
like little red cupcakes.

Ro: Da-nee! And they’re super, super red.
Dodger: They’re so cute.

Ro: And how you get this, you’re gonna take
white cake mix, and add red food

Ro: coloring to it, and I already did that
ahead of time, to save time, because
Ro: today we’re gonna focus on decorating!
Both: Gangnam style!

Dodger: So first we’re going to frost the
cupcakes, we have, like, this nice

Dodger: awkward fleshy tone, and then, a little
gray tone that Ro was

Dodger: working on this morning. Ro: For Larry
Jr!

Dodger: And then we have chocolate yeah? Ro:
Chocolate!

Dodger: We’re gonna frost with chocolate
too? Ro: Yeah because a lot of

Ro: things in the game, the background is
just browns… Dodger: Yeah.

Ro: And then, Larry Jr. is kind of a gray
and then Isaac is this pink-y,

Ro: ivory. Dodger: He’s all innocent. Ro:
And I just did this with food coloring

Ro: to get this gray, it’s just 1 drop
of black, you don’t want to use

Ro: any more than that with white frosting.
And you’re good. Dodger: Cool.

Dodger: Let’s do it! Ro: Yeah, let’s do
it!

Ro: Ta-da! We are done frosting! You are going
to need 5 gray for Larry Jr.’s

Ro: body, and then we have… Dodger: 4 of
the chocolate… Ro: Choco!

Dodger: Uh, 1 chest and then 3 hearts. Ro:
Mmmhmm.

Dodger: And then 3 peachy colored ones for
2 regular Isaacs, and then 1

Dodger: for the little Isaac’s that you fight in
there that are really happy but want
Dodger: blood. Ro: Frost evil Isaacs.

Ro: So when you’re done frosting, we’re
gonna stick these in the fridge for

Ro: about 10 minutes because they kind of
smooth over, the frosting does,

Ro: when they’re in the fridge. And we’re
going to make the chest.

Ro: While the cupcakes are cooling, we are
going to make our chests.
Ro: We have chocolate melts, brown and yellow!

Ro: And what I did is I traced the treasure
chest, and then you put a piece

Ro: of wax paper over it, and then I already
outlined the yellow.

Ro: We melted the brown chocolates and then
put it in this little baggie,

Ro: and now we’re just gonna trace over
the top of the yellow.

Ro: While Brooke helps me eat chocolate because
it’s so yummy.

Dodger: I was caught. Ro: I caught you! Dodger:
No! Ro: I caught you!

Ro: And then you’re gonna put this in the
freezer for about 15 minutes.

Dodger: OK, so we’re going to do 3 cupcakes
that are going to represent the

Dodger: 3 hearts that you start off with if
you are Isaac in Binding of Isaac.

Dodger: So, we have the cherry airheads, because
they’re the only red ones,

Dodger: right? Ro: Right. Dodger: And then,
we have a little cookie cutter

Dodger: that’s in the shape of a heart.
So they’ll be nice clean hearts,

Dodger: and you can still eat them, because
they’re airheads and they’re
Dodger: delicious. Ro: Yeah!

Ro: Yeah, just put in the cookie cutter and
kind of wiggle it down there.

Ro: Really put some weight on it, you know,
our whole 80 pounds of us, we
Ro: can just… Dodger: Ahhh! Ro: Combined.
Ro: Oh it’s so cute! Oh that’s so cute!

Dodger: Boop! Ro: Perfect! Dodger: Little
heart, yay! Ro: Yay!

Dodger: OK, so now we are going to make, uh,
Larry’s face, so like we said

Dodger: before… Ro: So like this! Dodger:
We will make 1 of them will have his

Dodger: crazy face, we get to make all those
teeth and stuff, so…

Ro: He has so many teeth. Dodger: I know it’s
gonna be awesome.
Ro: Do your Larry face.

Ro: First we’re gonna make his little eyeballs
with black frosting, if you

Ro: don’t have this you can use, um, a ziplock
bag, just cut a little hole

Ro: at the bottom with black frosting with
food coloring.

Ro: OK I’m gonna trace… Dodger: His crazy
mouth? Ro: Ugly, ugly mouth.

Dodger: We did it! Ro: Yeah, that took awhile
because the frosting is really

Ro: difficult, but we got his ugly mug on
there.

Dodger: Uh, I’m excited, it wound up looking
pretty good.

Ro: Yeah it did, now we’re gonna make teeth,
these snaggle teeth!

Ro: Out of our white airhead, and baking scissors.
We’re just gonna cut, meep!
Dodger: Ohhhhhhhh! Ro: And make little teeth!

Ro: We have just finished Larry’s little
ugly mug, and now we’re going to

Ro: decorate his body, and instead of using
the black frosting,

Ro: we will be using… Dodger: Licorice strip.
Ro: Dodger is holding licorice…

Ro: Black. Dodger: Oh it smells so good…
I’m gonna use this then I’m gonna eat

Dodger: all of it. Ro: Uhhh, I don’t…
Yeah.

Dodger: So we’re just gonna, like, we’re
gonna make it look like, kind of a
Dodger: maggot-y, caterpillar body.

Dodger: OK, so all we have left is Isaac and
the 2 evil Isaacs.

Ro: The 2 evil Isaac’s! Dodger: You find
a lot of the evil Isaac’s when you’re

Dodger: like, crawl around in the basement.
Ro: The evil ones!

Dodger: But they’re funny because they’re
also crying, but it’s, like, blood,
Dodger: and they’re happy about it… So…

Ro: They’re crying blood, like True Blood!
Like the Vampires cry blood.
Dodger: It’s good times.

Dodger: So first we’re gonna make regular
Isaac yeah? Ro: Mmmhmmm.

Dodger: And we’re using frosting for his
mouth and his eyeballs and then…

Dodger: Little… Ro: Chocolate covered sunflower
seeds, you can find these

Ro: at World Market or some grocery stores
carry them, like Trader Joes.
Dodger: Trader Joe’s has them, yeah.

Ro: Yeah, so we’re gonna use the bright
blue for normal Isaac, and then

Ro: we’re using the red, because they’re
tear shaped. Dodger: Yeah.
Ro: So they were perfect. Dodger: Works out.

Ro: But if you don’t have these you can
use other candies, like jelly beans
Ro: or whatever you want.

Dodger: Yay we finished them. Ro: Yay! Dodger:
After lot’s of tribulations.

Dodger: I really love the way that they look,
I like the way that  the little Isaac

Dodger: looks. Ro: Me too. Dodger: And just
this guy… Dude. That…

Ro: His teeth. Dodger: That wound up so good.
Ro: Look so awesome, I think

Ro: he’s my favorite one! Dodger: Yeah.
Ro: Yeah.

Dodger: It was all really, really fun to do
though. Ro: Yeah.

Dodger: I think this one was more successful
than the last time I was on here.

Ro: Yeah, last time we did cake pops it was
a little cray cray.

Dodger: Little cray cray. Ro: Little cray,
but we’re getting better!

Dodger: Yeah. Ro: Yeah! Oh! I almost forgot,
I will put Dodger’s link down below

Ro: because she has 2 channels, 1 is Press
Heart To Continue and the other 1

Ro: is coffee time where she does coffee every
morning. Dodger: Yeah.

Ro: Yeah, so you can have coffee with her
and hang out with her every morning!

Dodger: We have fun. Ro: Yeah, so I’ll put
it down below, and if you have

Ro: any other suggestions for any other Nerdy
Nummies, please leave me a comment

Ro: down below and I will do my best to make
them happen.
Ro: OK, thanks you guys for watching. Bye-bye!
Dodger: Bye-bye.
